title: Home Page Content Type
description: Document type definition for the multi-platform demo home page

properties.name: Heading
properties.description: Main heading displayed on the home page

properties.name: Description
properties.description: Brief description or tagline for the home page
properties.defaultValue: Welcome to our multi-platform demo showcasing C# (.NET), Node.js, Python, Java, Go, and Rust implementations.

properties.name: Canvas Section Title
properties.description: Title for the collaborative canvas section

properties.name: Canvas Description
properties.description: Description for the collaborative canvas feature
properties.defaultValue: Try our real-time collaborative drawing canvas! Draw together with others across different platforms.

properties.name: Launch Canvas Button Text
properties.description: Text for the canvas launch button

properties.name: Show QR Code Section
properties.description: Toggle to show/hide the QR code section

properties.name: QR Code Button Text
properties.description: Text for the QR code generator button

properties.name: Platform Links Title
properties.description: Title for the platform links section

properties.name: Show Platform Navigation
properties.description: Toggle to show/hide platform navigation links

properties.name: Show Server Info
properties.description: Toggle to show/hide server information (platform, version, timestamp)

properties.name: Custom CSS
properties.description: Custom CSS styles to apply to the home page

properties.name: Background Gradient Start
properties.description: Start color for the background gradient (hex color)

properties.name: Background Gradient End
properties.description: End color for the background gradient (hex color)

properties.name: SEO Title
properties.description: Page title for SEO (shown in browser tab and search results)

properties.name: SEO Description
properties.defaultValue: A demonstration of the same application built with multiple platforms: C# (.NET), Node.js, Python, Java, Go, and Rust.

properties.name: SEO Keywords
properties.defaultValue: multi-platform, C#, .NET, Node.js, Python, Java, Go, Rust, demo, collaborative canvas
